name: Magic Broom - Tilt To Clean
description:
Trash! Clean them before it is too late!

This game is easy. Just tilt iPhone to move the broom around and clean the trash. However, if trash stay on the screen for too long, game is over. So you need pick the path wisely. Have fun! :-)

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Tilt iPhone to move
•Clean before too late
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
